| icon           = poe2 glove_02 icon.png
| description    = These unassuming gloves are proof that form follows function. They are made from supple fawn leather, allowing for easy movement of the wrist and fingers. Nondescript wristbands offer convenient, discreet storage for picks, tension bars, and other tools of the saboteur's trade. Rawhide on the palms provides protection when gripping or climbing.
